sqlMap.update: update T_Finance_Service set id=#id# ,settle_number=#settle_number# ,transfer_id=#transfer_id# ,service_id=#service_id# ,is_arrivalpayment=#is_arrivalpayment# ,transfer_payment=#transfer_payment# ,arrival_payment=#arrival_payment# ,settlement_payment=#settlement_payment# ,real_payment=#real_payment# ,already_payment=#already_payment# ,settlement_mode=#settlement_mode# ,payment_date=#payment_date# ,service_memo=#service_memo# ,operator_man=#operator_man# ,branch_id=#branch_id# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Finance_Service WHERE id IN(#ids#)
